Achievements.Name: Beasted
Achievements.Description: You have bested a Juggernaut... and that's just the beginning!

Achievements.Name: General demoted
Achievements.Description: You have slain a Deadwalker General and saved the village of Valvenor from a massacre.

Achievements.Name: Farewell my Concubine
Achievements.Description: Your aggressive stance on polygamy has taken its first victim in Blackfrost's entourage.

Achievements.Name: ...the harder they fall
Achievements.Description: You have bested Lord Blackfrost himself!

Achievements.Name: The one and only Lord
Achievements.Description: You have stripped the Ice Lords of their power and taken control of Vertiel.

Achievements.Name: Purifying fire
Achievements.Description: You decided that there was nothing left of Vertiel to save, and taken extreme measures.

Achievements.Name: Sacrifice
Achievements.Description: Your heroic actions have saved Vertieland you have paid with your own life.

Achievements.Name: Unleash the Beast
Achievements.Description: To hell with humanity, even your own: you have decided that the power is worth the sacrifice.

Achievements.Name: Humanist
Achievements.Description: You have controlled the inner voice and taken care to preserve your humanity until the end.

Achievements.Name: Mercenary
Achievements.Description: Either for love of your fellow human or simple greed, you have accomplished your 20th side quest.

Achievements.Name: Ice breaker
Achievements.Description: You have melted Edwen's frosty facade. Or at least, she checks you out when you're not looking.

Achievements.Name: Romance with pointy ears
Achievements.Description: You have bested Rhelmar at his own game: The ladykiller Elf has a crush on you.

Achievements.Name: Erudite love
Achievements.Description: Responding both to your kindness, and your advances, the ravishing Sybil has the hots for you.

Achievements.Name: Chivalrandy
Achievements.Description: Randval has abandoned his deathwish while succumbing to your charms. Double whammy!

Achievements.Name: Patron
Achievements.Description: You proved yourself a guardian of the seekers of knowledge by fulfilling all of Sybil's missions.

Achievements.Name: A fulfilled elf
Achievements.Description: You have shown Rhelmar he can count on you.

Achievements.Name: Without fear, without reproach
Achievements.Description: You have helped Randval resolve all of his personal problems...well, most of them anyway.

Achievements.Name: At the lady's service
Achievements.Description: You have made the effort to respond to all of Edwen's demands. She even thanked you....once.

Achievements.Name: Hawk
Achievements.Description: You have reached the end of Bound by Flame. Not bad, for a scout.

Achievements.Name: Buffalo
Achievements.Description: As a good veteran, you have managed to complete Bound by Flame under difficult conditions.

Achievements.Name: Captain
Achievements.Description: As a worthy Captain, you have completed Bound by Flame under the most extreme conditions.

Achievements.Name: Just a warm-up
Achievements.Description: You learn to use your weapons. 25 people have already done so before you.

Achievements.Name: Just a warning
Achievements.Description: You had earned the curiosity of the Ice Lords. 75 kills later, you have their attention.

Achievements.Name: Just a slaughter
Achievements.Description: With 150 victims, you are officially the bane of the Deadwalkers.

Achievements.Name: Shot your bolt
Achievements.Description: Thanks to you, 50 crossbow bolts have found a new home in your enemies' flesh.

Achievements.Name: Bloody hell
Achievements.Description: You have killed 50 enemies with a dagger. People often talk about you to frighten small children.

Achievements.Name: Quite a hammering
Achievements.Description: You have slain or re-slain more than 50 enemies with a warhammer. That is rather violent.

Achievements.Name: Sword it out
Achievements.Description: 49 enemies killed with a sword. You crossed the line...and then some.

Achievements.Name: Psycho killer
Achievements.Description: You have slain enough victims with an axe to fuel urban legends for centuries to come.

Achievements.Name: It's a trap!
Achievements.Description: You like setting booby-traps and they work. More than twenty have already fallen to them.

Achievements.Name: I'm on fire
Achievements.Description: You have transformed your enemies into flaming torches 50 times. They have probably got the message.

Achievements.Name: First come, first served
Achievements.Description: Knowing that no one would argue with you, you have looted 20 chests.

Achievements.Name: And I don't throw things away
Achievements.Description: You've learned to recycle objects that you no longer need, instead of throwing them away.

Achievements.Name: Craftsmanship
Achievements.Description: Congratulations! With all the objects you have made, you could open up a store.

Achievements.Name: Blacksmith
Achievements.Description: You have learned the secrets of improving weapons and armour.

Achievements.Name: Vulture
Achievements.Description: You have learned the habit of looting the bodies of fallen enemies. That's war for you...

Achievements.Name: Chrysalid
Achievements.Description: You have played the poison card more than 50 times. It works every time.

Achievements.Name: First steps
Achievements.Description: You have upgraded your first skill, and improved your chances of survival at the same time.

Achievements.Name: Master at arms
Achievements.Description: There is no better warrior than you in all of Vertiel. Even among the Freeborn Blades.

Achievements.Name: Master Ranger
Achievements.Description: The Ranger skills hold no more secrets for you.

Achievements.Name: Firestarter
Achievements.Description: Skill after skill, you have truly mastered the art of playing with fire.
